products.name: Simplicity R5 14-16-18-20-22 Sewing Pattern 2172 Misses Costume
products.description: ZIG-Art & Graphic Twin: 6 Piece Set. These water-based dye markers are ideal for crafters of all kinds: designers; illustrators; rubber stampers; card makers; scrapbookers and more! The convenience of two tips styles (Brush and .8mm) make them perfect for any and every project! This package contains six 7-1/2 inch long dual tip markers. Available in a variety of color sets: each sold separately. Xylene free. Conforms to ASTM D-4236; ACMI certified. Imported.

products.name: Simplicity Sewing Pattern 5794 A Misses Costumes
products.description: Sewing pattern 5794 Capes,

products.name: Simplicity Sewing Pattern 4797 A Boy and Girl Costumes
products.description: AMERICAN CRAFTS-Alpha Stickers. Great for any stamper. These pigment ink stamp pads come in transparent, stackable cases. This package contains one stamp pad. Available in a variety of colors: each sold separately. Imported.

products.name: Mccall's Patterns MC7000MISS Small 8 - 10 Medium 12 - 14 Large 16 - 18 Extra-Large 20 - 22 Misses/ Childrens/ Girls Costumes
products.description: Mccalls Costumes Includes pattern pieces and sewing instructions Fabrics: Cotton/cotton blends, satin/sateen, lightweight jacquard Designed for Lightweight Woven Fabrics. Printed in the U.S.A., Weight: 0.2 lbs., Manufacturer: The McCall Pattern Company

products.name: Kwik Sew Children's Shorts, Vest & Hat Sewing Patterns, 3398
products.description: Create wonderful homemade designs your children will love with this excellent set of sewing patterns and instructions. The kit includes a step-by-step guide to sewing your very own children's shorts, vest and hat. Turn your favourite patterned fabrics into on-trend pieces for a practical outfit or thoughtful gift. Sizes: 4-14 years

products.name: Kwik Sew Misses' Tops & Skirts Sewing Patterns
products.description: This excellent sewing patterns set from the popular Kwik Sew brand offers all the expertise you need to start creating fashionable outfits at home. The Kwik Sew sewing patterns give you detailed sewing guides and step-by-step instructions to turn your favourite patterned fabrics into unique and stylish outfits. This set includes instructions for two tops and two skirts in varying complementary styles. Sizes: XS-XL

products.name: Kwik Sew Misses' Tunics Sewing Patterns, 3377
products.description: This excellent set of sewing patterns from Kwik Sew offer all the information needed to design and create uniquely fashionable tunic tops for women. Simply choose your favourite fabric - cotton, linen and silk are all suitable - and follow the detailed instructions to create a stylish homemade tunic. The set includes three distinct designs for varied and complementary styles. Sizes: XS-XL

products.name: Kwik Sew Misses' Jackets Sewing Patterns, 3334
products.description: The Kwik Sew Misses' Jackets sewing patterns set gives you all the expertise you need to design and create two complementary styles of fashionable women's jackets. Simply choose your favourite patterned fabrics and follow the helpful step-by-step instructions to create your dream outfit. The two jackets vary in cut and style to give you a versatile choice of fashionable designs. Sizes: XS-XL

products.name: Kwik Sew Misses' Fleece Jackets Sewing Patterns, 3297
products.description: This excellent sewing patterns set from the popular Kwik Sew brand features two patterns, complete with instructions, to create two zip-up fleece jackets. For extra detail and design variety, they have contrasting side panels and facings. One pattern also includes a hood. Sizes: XS-XL

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Top and Skirt, 3254
products.description: This set of tops and skirts have clean simple cuts adding effortless style and versatility as these tops can be worn casually with the skirts as well as formally. Designed for light to medium weight woven fabrics such as linen, challis and cotton. The tops are sleeveless with bust darts. Variant A top has a V-neckline. Variant B top has a boat neckline. The flared eight-panel skirts have elastic in the waist. The tops and skirts are very easy to sew and have special easy-to-follow sewing instructions.

products.name: Vogue Women's Coat, Dress and Coat, 1137
products.description: Channel 1950's glamour with this sewing pattern from Vogue. This pattern creates a stunning evening dress and jacket. Create in contrast fabrics for an uber stylish look. The coat pattern creates a very loose-fitting, reversible flared coat with a stand-up collar, patch pockets with flaps and below elbow length kimono sleeves with deep cuffs. The dress is sleeveless dresses with a lined bodice, v-neckline, darts, side zipper and side vent openings. Variant B includes a belt pattern. Variant C includes patch pockets with flaps and purchased belt.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Evening Gown, 1094
products.description: Channel Old-Hollywood glamour with this 1950s sewing pattern from Vogue. Lined and sleeveless the dress has a classic darted, fitted bodice with a dropped waistline, inside belt, neckline bands, gathered skirt and side zipper. Variant A: below mid-knee length. Variant B: floor length.

products.name: Vogue Beville Sassoon Women's Gown, 1095
products.description: This sewing pattern from Beville Sassoon creates a gown perfect for that special day. Fully lined, this princess seemed dress features a flared, floor length skirt with a lined underskirt with pleated ruffle and lace trim. The attached foundation has boning.

products.name: Vogue Ralph Rucci Women's Evening Gown, 1075
products.description: Create your own elegant evening gown with this Ralph Rucci sewing pattern from Vogue. Channeling old Hollywood glamour the pattern creates a close-fitting, self-lined floor length dress with a shaped contrast bodice and front slit. The angled invisible zipper closing and lower back godeted bodice extends into the train. Also includes a pattern for a matching self-lined stole with a back dart.

products.name: Vogue Guy Laroche Women's Evening Gown, 1047
products.description: This stunning Guy Laroche sewing pattern from Vogue creates an eye-catching, elegant evening gown. Self-lined it features an asymmetrical gathered skirt paired with a draped keyhole front and backless style back finished with a wide bead trim waist and invisible side zipper closing.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Coat, 1083
products.description: Create this timelessly chic coat made from camel hair, ottoman and wool broadcloth and lightweight flannel for the interlining. This luxurious, loose-fitting coat falls below mid-calf length and has a shaped collar, dropped shoulders and wide, bracelet length sleeves that can be worn turned up forming deep cuffs. Feel like a classic film star in this coat using this pattern by Vogue. Coat A, B: 1/2" Raglan Shoulder Pads or Vogue #9723 and Seam Binding.

products.name: Vogue Women's Suit, 1132
products.description: Create your very workwear wardrobe with this sewing pattern from Vogue. Includes patterns for gathered back blazer, gathered back waistcoat, calf length godet skirt and suit trousers. Jackets A and B have princess seams, collar and lapels, gored back (back is longer than front) and shaped hem. Variant A is sleeveless. Variant B has shoulder pads and sleeves. Skirt is flared, bias which stops above ankle with waistband and side zipper closure. Straight-legged pants have waistband, mock fly zipper closure and side seam pockets. Purchased top and belt.

products.name: Vogue Koos van den Akker Women's Coat, 1146
products.description: Create this mystical patchwork jacket from Koos van der Akker with this sewing pattern from Vogue. Loose-fitting, flared coats stopping below the mid-knee with collar, collar binding extending into tie ends, deep armholes, contrast yokes, patches, applique, binding, side front pockets, front button closure and long sleeves with elastic. Variant A: contrast upper collar and lining, wrong side of fabric used for trim detail will show. Variant B: contrast collar and ribbon trim on back.

products.name: Vogue Kay Unger Women's Dress, 1182
products.description: This Kay Unger sewing pattern from Vogue creates a flattering sleeveless open neck dress, ideal for cocktail and evening parties. Fitted, above mid-knee and fully lined, variants A and B with princess seams, front pleats, large collar, back slit opening and invisible zipper closing. B: purchased trim.

products.name: Burda Girl's Dress, 9457
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for a girls' cute dirndl dress with short puff sleeves and matching apron or fanciful variant with long sleeves and flounces. Pattern includes buttoned front, square neck and ruffle. Sizes: 6 months - 3 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Overalls, 9464
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for three hip and sporty bib overalls with side fastener, adjustable straps, hip-yoke pockets and rearward patch pockets. You can choose between three different lengths and different pockets. Sizes: 6-11 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Folklore Drindl Costume, 9509
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for a chic dirndl in two lengths, combined with two fabrics and matching aprons. The dirndl blouse is available with short puff sleeves or long narrow sleeves. Sizes: 4-10 years.

products.name: Burda Girls' Princess & Snow White Costume, 2480
products.description: Make outfits fit for a princess with this Simplicity sewing pattern. Includes dress with a wide skirt, puff sleeves, blossoms and lace. Snow white dress has long, slit sleeves and an extra cape with a high collar. Sizes: 4-9 years.

products.name: Burda Boys' Regency Suit Costume, 9528
products.description: Make a sophisticated get-up for your little gentleman with this sewing pattern from Simplicity. Jacket A is made lapels and tail; Vest B with back tab; Trousers C with button-down pants. The three-quarter-length pants are buttoned at the side. Sizes: 7-14 years.

products.name: Burda Children's T-Shirt & Hoodie, 9614
products.description: Make a range of stylish T-shirts for your little trendsetters by following this sewing pattern from Simplicity. Sizes: 3-13 years.

products.name: Burda Girl's Dress & Jacket, 9702
products.description: Sewing pattern for dresses with back buttoning and gathered skirt. Dress A: Sleeveless, country-house style. Dress B: With puff sleeves; turns into a dirndl when worn with apron. C: Wear with knitted jacket D. Sizes: 18M, 2, 3, 4, 5

products.name: Burda Children's Dress & Trouser, 9694
products.description: Sewing pattern for a sleeveless dress with yoke, to be worn with and without a shirt. Sleeveless dress A: The short variant, as slits at the sides. Worn with matching pants. D: With waistband, also slit at the sides. Sizes : 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13 jun, 14 jun

products.name: Burda Girl's Dress & Jacket, 9755
products.description: Sewing pattern for a country style dress. A: Sleeveless. B: With puff sleeves. Can also be worn as a dirndl with apron. C: Jacket. D: For colder weather. Sizes : 6-11

products.name: Burda Children's Dressing Gown, 2662
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for making a kids' cuddly bathing gown with hood or shawl collar, patch pockets and tie-belt. Sizes: 3-8 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Louis-Philippe Costume, 9529
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for a dress with form-fitting bodice and wide, ruffled skirt. Model A is made with three-quarter-length sleeves and shorter skirt; dress B with puff sleeves, collar and a border ruffle. Sizes: 7-14 years.

products.name: Burda Boy's Lederhosen Costume, 9508
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for chic lederhosen with bib, typical embroidery and button-on suspenders. The shorts are ideal for the summer and the knee-length pants are great for the rest of the year. Sizes: 4-10 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Dressing Gown Pattern, 9643
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for a play mat, cuddly toy animal, bathrobe and washcloth shaped like a cow or a piglet. Play mat AB becomes a nice and soft playing surface when made with volume fleece. One size.

products.name: Burda Children's Jacket and Vest, 9484
products.description: Make stylish jackets for boys and girls with this Simplicity sewing pattern. Version A is cosy and warm inside through the reverse side of the fur. Sporty variant B is lined with warming cotton and versatile fur vest C has a premium touch. Sizes: 8-14 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Dressing Gown, 9620
products.description: Make a cuddly bathrobe for girls and boys with this Simplicity sewing pattern. You can choose between a shawl collar or hood, both of which are doubled with contrasting fabric, just like the cuffs. Sizes: 10-16 years.

products.name: Burda Children's Musketeer Costume, 9659
products.description: Make a classic dress and shirt ideal for warm days with this Simplicity sewing pattern. Variant A is a long tunic with slit and hooded cape; Variant B is a ruffled shirt with collar, tunic with emblem. Includes leg cuffs with elastic band for boots. Sizes: 4-10 years.

products.name: Vogue DKNY Dresses, 100420
products.description: Create a luxe wrap evening dress with the Vogue DKNY sewing pattern. This easy-to-master kit has the pattern for a calf length dress which features a semi-fitted, pleated and lapped bodice, bias skirt with inseam pockets and stitched hems. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals. Allow extra fabric to match plaids or stripes. Use nap yardages/layouts for pile, shaded or one-way design fabrics. Sizes: 14-22

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Jacket, 1263
products.description: Create your own stylish Donna Karen jacket with this sewing pattern. The jacket has a very loose-fitting fir with side front pockets and felted seams. No provisions for above waist adjustments.

products.name: Vogue Rachel Comey Women's Skirt and Top, 1247
products.description: This sewing pattern will create a top and skirt designed by Rachel Comey that's perfect for the warmer weather. Very loose-fitting pull-over top. Semi-fitted A-lined skirt has front in-seam pockets and invisible zipper.

products.name: Vogue Belville Sasson Women's Dress, 1108
products.description: This Beville Sassoon sewing pattern from Vogue creates an elegant evening gown with ruffled bow detailing on the waist. In a straight, semi-fitted fit, with an above knee length the pattern features self-fabric pipping at the neckline. Invisable zipper on the side with hood and eye strap opening. Below hip length foundation has boning. Front and back are pleated into left side seam, self-fabric bow at left side front.

products.name: Vogue Anne Klein Women's Suit, 1293
products.description: Create a beautiful jacket and trousers using Anne Klein's easy sewing pattern for Vogue. When complete the fitted, unlined jacket features a collar, collar band, yokes (no shoulder seams), seam detail with trim insertion, side front pockets, two-piece sleeves with slit, concealed front button closing with placket and saddle stitching. The semi-fitted, tapered trousers have a contour waistband, carriers, side front pockets, fly front zipper, hem slit, and narrow hem. Would suit linen, crepe or dupioni fabric.

products.name: Vogue Koos van den Akker Women's Reversable Coat, 1277
products.description: Create your very own stylish Koos van der Akker coat, reversible giving you two stunning designs in one. Patterned side features an intricate patchwork with plain fabric on the reverse. Jacket is very loose-fitting with wrap opening, front and back cut-in-one with standing collar, no side seams, bias middle/lower fronts and backs, welt pockets, pockets stitched in place, bias trim and long sleeves with diagonal seam and bias trim. Shaped back hemline is longer than front

products.name: Vogue Women's Issey Miyake Tunic and Trousers, 1309
products.description: Create these tunic and trousers with Vogue’s sewing pattern. They’ve been designed by Japanese fashion collection, Issey Miyake. It’s a bold and stylish outfit that is sure to make an impact. Comes with full instructions and detailed designs.

products.name: Vogue Women's DNKY Jumpsuit, 1308
products.description: Create your own DKNY jumpsuit with this sewing pattern from Vogue. This jumpsuit has been designed by New York fashion house, DKNY. It’s a smooth, smart and striking look. The jumpsuit has loose-fitting, blouson bodice, applied flounces (wrong side shows), bias neck facing and armhole binding, waist casing, elastic/tie ends, tapered pants (semi-fitted through hips), side front pockets, and invisible back zipper. Use washed silk, crepe de chine and lightweight jersey fabrics.

products.name: Vogue Marcy Tilton Women's Top, 8363
products.description: Designed by the fashion house of Marcy Tilton this top sewing pattern from Vogue creates stylish women's tops in four different designs. The tops are fitted, pullover tops with darted neckbands. Variant A has contrast sleeve and neck band, lower edge of sleeve is raw-finished. Variants B and C have three-quarter length sleeves. Variant C features pleats over front neck darts and decorative buttons. Variant D has darts on the outside neck band and lower edge of sleeves. Moderate stretch knits only.

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top, 8649
products.description: Create your very own Vogue designed top using this easy-to-sew top sewing pattern Semi-fitted, pullover top with have gathers, kimono sleeves and stitched hems. Variant A has short sleeves. Variant B has a contrast lower front and lower back. Variants B and C have three-quarter length sleeves. Separate pattern pieces provided for A, B, C, D cup sizes for a tailored fit.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Skirt Suit, 1019
products.description: Based on an original 1947 pattern this Vogue sewing pattern allows you to create a classic skirt suit set with classic detailing such as the flounce back that still look great today. The jacket is fully lined, with seam and black flounce detailing and long sleeves with gathering at the elbow and bound buttonholes. Fully lined, the skirt is in a classic A-line fit in a mid-calf length with and high waistband and side snap closing.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dress, 1014
products.description: Create your own beautiful evening dress with this sewing pattern from Vogue. With stunning knot detailing on the front, cut on a bias with an asymmetrical hem. finished with an invisible zipper closure across the back. Suitable for use on crepe stains and jerseys, unstable for obvious diagonals. Allow extra fabric to match plaids or stripes. Use nap yardages/layouts for pile, shaded or one-way design fabrics. Reverse side of fabric will show as contrast.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Dress, 8728
products.description: Recreate the style of the past in this beautiful dress and belt design using lightweight jersey, crepe de chine and linen for fabric. The dress has shoulder pads, a side snap or zipper closing with a side buckle belt (minus the prong). Perfect for those relaxed evening occasions.

products.name: Vogue Women's Jacket and Belt, 8732
products.description: This pattern displays a belt and loose-fitting jacket with shoulder pads and tailoring details. Create this versatile jacket which an be worn for a day out shopping, to work or to dinner. Made from broadcloth, lightweight linen, twill and satin. NOTIONS: Jacket: One Pair of 1/2" Shoulder Pads, Optional Plain Weave Cotton Tape and Seven 1" Buttons.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Dress And Jacket, 8767
products.description: Get into the 50s revival trend by creating your own vintage ensemble with Vogue's sewing pattern. Suitable for Silk Crepe, Satin, Lightweight Woolens, Linen, and Batiste, Crepe de chine, or Georgette for the details. The semi-fitted, unlined jacket has self-lined front and peplum, and bound buttonhole linked button closing. The pullover dress is close-fitting through bust, has front neck slit, optional side extensions, snap or zipper, and self belt. Variations A and C have hemline pleat on sleeves. Variation D has a single layer collar/jabot and inseam snaps on sleeves.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dress, 8867
products.description: With this Vogue sewing pattern you'll be able to create stylish formal dresses in six different styles. The dresses are as easy to wear as they are to make, ideal for office wear. Pattern creates close-fitting dresses that have a lined bodice with darts, raised neckline with front slit, extended shoulders, inset and back zipper closing. Variants A and F are short sleeved, variants B, C, D and E are sleeveless. Variants A, B and C have a straight skirt while D,E and F have a flared skirt.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dress, 8633
products.description: This easy to sew pattern from Vogue contains six dress variations, ideal for any occasion, from office to bar, picnic to party you'll have all bases covered with this pattern. All variants have lined bodices with darts, raised neckline with front slit, extended shoulders and inset and back zipper closing. Variants A and F have short sleeves. Variants B, C, D and E are sleeveless. Variants A, B, C have a straight skirt, variants D, E, F have a flared skirt.

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Vest, 8651
products.description: Versatile and easy to sew, this sewing pattern from Vogue creates three styles of vests and t-shirts with draping detailing. Patterns have have scoop neckline and side symmetrical pointed hem. Variant B has short sleeves with stitched hem. Variant C has side gathers.

products.name: Vogue Claire Shaeffer Women's Trousers, 8652
products.description: This Vogue sewing has been designed by the fashion house of Claire Shaeffer who have created stylish palazzo trousers. Create with a plain crepe or cotton for a classic look or use light semi-sheer floral fabric for a modern, boho vibe. This pattern creates loose-fitting, slightly flared, lined trousers with a faced waistline. Pleated front, darted back, fly front opening and bound buttonhole.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Dress and Coat, 8687
products.description: Recreate classic 1950s glamour with this sewing pattern from Vogue, first published in 1954 as part of the Gwendolyn Kassoff Pattern Collection it features a calf length dress with belt and matching jacket. Dress has yoke, fitted bodice, darted, semi-fitted straight skirt with back vent and side zipper, self fabric belt. Straight, loose-fitting, mid-calf, lined coat has collarless yoke, kimono, below elbow sleeves with cuffs, topstitching trim. Purchased decorative pin.

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 8711
products.description: Create a figure flattering skirt with the Vogue Options sewing pattern. In mid-knee and mid-calf length variations, the mock wrap skirt features gathered front, yoke, elasticized waistband and stitched hem. Variations A and D have a contrast yoke and waistband, while F has a button trim. Suits two-way stretch knits.

products.name: Vogue Women's Trousers & Top, 8717
products.description: Create smart trousers and tops using the Vogue Very Easy sewing pattern. Close-fitting, 1" above waist, lined to edge vest A or jacket B have front slanted seams, back princess seams and snap closure. B: three-quarter length sleeves with stitched pleats. Pants C have high waist, straight legs, front stitched pleats, front and back darts, side seam pockets and back zipper.

products.name: Vogue Elizabeth Gillett Women's Jacket, 8721
products.description: This sewing pattern allows you to create elegant shrugs, wraps and evening jackets designed by Elizabeth Gillett NYC. Wrap A has large bow with knot, an elasticized loop for wearing, narrow hem finish and is cut on crosswise grain. Lined shrug B has front crosswise seam, darts, covered button closing and center back seam. Jacket C has front and back darts, short sleeves with gathers, cuffs and narrow hem finish on back. Jacket D is semi-fitted, lined, front and back darts, angled and bias cut middle, lower fronts, middle and lower backs, three-quarter length sleeves.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dress, 8685
products.description: With this sewing pattern from Vogue you will be able to create a range of stylish dresses ideal for work and formal occasions in six different variations. Variants A, B, C, D, E, F have bodice with pleats and darts, midriff, yoke, topstitched trim and back zipper. A, B, D, E: cap raglan sleeves. C, F: long raglan sleeves. A, B, C: tapered, back slit and stitched hem. D, E, F: flared with narrow hem. Moderate Stretch Knits Only.

products.name: Vogue Marcy Tilton Women's Jacket, 8693
products.description: This sewing pattern creates a stylish jackets designed by Marcy Tilton. Jackets are loose fitting with a shawl collar, long sleeves and shaped hem. Variant A has a self-faced front and upper back, topstitching, front button closure, stitched hems. Variant B is partially lined with welt pockets and optional purchased decorative safety pin closure

products.name: Vogue Women's Smart Jacket and Trousers, 8756
products.description: Create this effortlessly chic jacket and trousers following this pattern using synthetic suede, lightweight denim, lightweight wool flannel or lightweight linen for fabric. The jacket is loose-fitting and the trousers are straight-legged, fitted, with side pockets.

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 8749
products.description: Feel fun, free and feminine in this flowing skirt which you can create using this paper pattern. This skirt design is versatile, ideal for wearing day or night, casually or for a formal occasion. The skirt is flared with waist facing and side seam pockets varying in length, from the knee to the calf to the ankle.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dresses, 8810
products.description: This very complete sewing pattern comes with instructions to make a variety of different style day dresses. All models have front band extending into back collar, dropped shoulders, loose-fitting bodice, waist casing, stitched hems, and belt. Variations A, B and C come semi-fitted through the hips. Variations C and F have sleeves with pleats, seam opening and button cuffs. Variations D, E and F have side pockets and narrow hem. Suitable for Crepe De Chine, Silk Like Broadcloth, and Linen.

products.name: Vogue Claire Shaeffer Women's Jacket, 8804
products.description: This paper pattern is of a semi-fitted, lined jacket with princess seams, side panels, pockets and two-piece sleeves. Designed for tweed, boucle and mohair fabric and china silk fabric for the lining, this piece is an ideal work look. Note: pre-quilting required. Purchased trim. Sizes:6-8-10-12-14

products.name: Vogue Women's Jacket, Top, Dress, Skirt And Pants, 8799
products.description: Design your own workwear wardrobe with Vogue's sewing pattern. The fabrics we recommend for a picture perfect result are lightweight Linen, Silk Tweed, and lightweight Crepe. The loose-fitting, unlined jacket has collar, elastic back, and two-piece sleeves with elastic forming ruching effect/slit, and topstitching. The fitted top or dress has seam detail and back zipper. The semi-fitted skirt or straight-legged pants have self-lined yokes. The skirt has pleated lower back.

products.name: Vogue Women's Tops, 8793
products.description: This pattern shows you how to create fitted, long sleeved tops with inner/outer contrast collars, cuffs and a stitched hem. The contrast collar is cut on crosswise grain of fabric. These tops are designed for moderate stretch knits such as lightweight jersey and cotton knit. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top, 8792
products.description: Create this cute, casual top using this pattern with moderate stretch knits including lightweight double knit, silk jersey and lightweight wool jersey. The top is loose-fitting, with the front extending to the upper back. D,E and F are close-fitting with a raw-edge finish. Sleeve variations are shown on each design.

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunics, 8791
products.description: These mock wrap tunics are semi-fitted with a collar and an asymmetric shaped hemline. Variant B: stitched hem on the sleeves. Variant C: The sleeves are pleated into button cuffs with a seam opening. These tunics are designed for lightweight broadcloth, lightweight linen and chambray. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals.

products.name: Vogue Women's Tops, 8790
products.description: Create this set of mock wrap tops that can be worn casually or smartly, using this pattern. These tops are close-fitting made for two-way stretch knits including cotton/spandex and nylon/spandex. You can this top with no sleeves, cap sleeves and long sleeves. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top And Trousers, 8798
products.description: Create beautiful casual ensembles with this sewing pattern from Vogue. The semi-fitted, lined top has front band with conceal snap closing. The semi-fitted, straight-legged pants have waistband, back zipper and narrow hem. Designed for lightweight Broadcloth, lightweight Denim, or lightweight Linen.

products.name: Vogue Elizabeth Gillett NYC Women's Jacket and Bolero, 8796
products.description: Create these stylish jackets and bolero with this sewing pattern by Elizabeth Gillet NYC and Vogue. With four different pattern variants you'll soon have a beautiful jacket for every occasion! Jacket A has contrast, bias andd applied bands. Front and back B, and front and side back C: cut-in-one, and no shoulder or side seams. C: contrast back, and purchased rosettes. D: fitted, side panels, no side seams, lower band (cut on crosswise grain of fabric) extending into tie ends and purchased lace appliques. A, B and D: very narrow hem and french seam finish.

products.name: Vogue Marcy Tilton Women's Jacket, 8795
products.description: This sewing pattern was created by famed American designer Marcy Tilton for Vogue. Create stunning light weight jackets that look great with your favourite outfits. Jackets are semi-fitted and unlined with a collar. The left front extends into draping and stitched hems. Variant A features purchased decorative hook/eye tape for closing. A and C: right front and right collar edges may be cut on selvage, wrong side of fabric shows on drape. B and C: purchased decorative zipper.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dresses, 8787
products.description: This comprehensive sewing pattern guide will help you create a variety of day dresses. The package includes several models with fitted bodice variations, midriff, tapered or flared skirt and back zipper. Suitable for lightweight double knit, lightweight crepe, or tropical wool Variations C and E have side front, side back seams, and side pockets, all the other models have semi-fitted skirt and back slit. Variations D, E and F have bias front bodice with fold-back facing.

products.name: Sew Over It Ultimate Shift Dress Sewing Pattern
products.description: Create the ultimate shift dress using this pattern in varying styles with the ability to be worn for various occasions, from casual to formal, day to night. Team the dress with a waist-belt to create a cinched in look or wear loosely. Ultimate shift dress pattern for sizes 8-20. Beginner level.

products.name: Sew Over It Women's Ultimate Trousers Sewing Pattern
products.description: Create these versatile trousers using this paper pattern with the option to create shorts in the same design. Team with a smart silky blouse for a special event or a plain t-shirt for a nice day out. Ultimate trousers pattern for sizes 8-20. Intermediate level.

products.name: Sew Over It 1940s Tea Dress Sewing Pattern
products.description: Go about your day in 1940s style by creating this vintage-inspired tea dress. This design has facings around the neckline and sleeve hems, a fluted skirt, an invisible zip down the centre back and three decorative buttons at the front. Tea dress dressmaking pattern for sizes 8-20. Intermediate to advanced level.

products.name: Vogue Women's Jacket, Shorts and Trousers, 9011
products.description: With these sewing patterns from Vogue, you can create these smart, casual classics. They’ll have a light feel and will look great with sandals or heels. Recommended fabrics to use include broadcloth, linen and crepe.

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top, 8877
products.description: This sewing pattern from Vogue creates easy-to-sew tops in a variety of sleeve lengths and patterns.

products.name: Vogue Elizabeth Gillett Women's Jacket, 8885
products.description: No Description

Variation A comes with: narrow hem, variation B is fitted through the hips, has sleeves, and stitched hem. Suggested fabrics: Crepe, Jersey, Lightweight Linen.

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top, Dress and Trousers, 8886

products.name: Vogue Women's Robe, Slip and Camisole, 8888

products.name: Vogue Claire Shaeffer Women's Jacket, 88893

Lining: Georgette and Charmeuse. Unsuitable for obvious diagonals.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Dress and Coat, 8875
products.description: First designed in 1957, this sewing pattern is part of Vogue's Vintage model collection, with modern finishing touches this pattern creates a knee length dress with matching coat, belt and detachable collar. Dress has close-fitting bodice with side front/side back seams, inside belt, front pleated skirt, side zipper, and self belt with buckle. Fitted and flared coat has front extending into back collar, detachable collar, princess darts, hook/eye closure and tie ends. A and B: front and back cut-in-one with sleeves.

products.name: Vogue Katherine Tilton Women's Jacket, 8863
products.description: Create a stylish blouse with this Katherine Tilton sewing pattern from Vogue. Pattern includes three variations. Semi-fitted, pullover tops, variant A, B have topstitching details. A: top applied neck trim and pleated sleeves (raw edges visible at top of sleeve and neck edge, wrong side of fabric will show at neck edge), double needle topstitched seams and hems, optional silk screened motifs. B: forward shoulder, top mostly cut on crosswise grain, bound neck edge, long sleeves, stitched hems. Package includes Katherine Tilton's instructions for silk-screening.

products.name: Vogue Women's Trousers, 8909
products.description: Create versatile trousers with Vogue's sewing pattern. Fitted below the waist, this pants have elastic and purchased ribbon drawstring, yoke back, side front seams, no side seams, and pockets. Trousers A and B have leg bands (elasticized) B and C come with stitched hems. Suggested fabrics are Jersey, Crepe, and Light Weight Gabardine.

products.name: Vogue Women's Blazer, 8910
products.description: This pattern from Vogue creates stylish blazers that looks as great with causal outfits as it does with more formal and office wear. Blazers are semi-fitted, cut on the bias lined with shoulder pads and shaped hemline variations. A is a cropped length blazer with mandarin style collar and single button front. B is a longer length blazer with mandrain collar and front pleats that extend into the back collar. C is a longer length blazer with no collar and cross-over button front.

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunic, 8907
products.description: Stylish, easy-to-wear tunics that look great dressed up or down can be created with this Vogue sewing pattern. Tops have narrow hems with wrong side visible on draping on A, B and shaped hemline on variant C.

products.name: Vogue Women's Smart and Casual, 8911

The jacket and top are designed for sheer fabrics such as sateen, voile and linen. The shorts and trousers are designed for moderate stretch knit fabric.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top, Shorts And Trousers, 8912
products.description: Create a complete casual ensemble with this sewing pattern. products.name: New Look Women's Trousers Sewing Patterns, 6005
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for making women's pull-on trousers with pockets and hem variations. Pick a fabric to match your style. Sizes: 10-22.

products.name: New Look Women's Dresses & Skirts, 6054
products.description: Simplicity New Look sewing pattern for making women's pull-on skirts with length variations. Perfect for wearing on warm, sunny days. Sizes: 4-16.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top And Trousers, 8913

Variation B has button tab on sleeves. The semi-fitted, tapered pants have waistband and side zipper. Variation C has side hemline slits. Recommended fabrics: Silk Crepe, Linen Blends, Broadcloth.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top, Trouser And Dress, 8915
products.description: No Description

Suggested fabrics for Jacket, Skirt D and Dress are Tweeds, and Linen. For the top and Skirt E Lace, or Eyelet. And Lining Fabrics, or Charmeuse for the linings.

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top, 8925

Variants A and B have an applied neck band, lapped seams and raw edge finish.

products.name: Simplicity New Look Dresses Dressmaking Leaflet, 6723

products.name: Vogue Women's Dresses, 8902

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's, 8906

products.name: New Look Women's Outfits & Bags, 6270

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top, 8905

products.name: Vogue Claire Shaeffer Women's Jacket, 8845

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Top and Trousers, 8840

products.name: Vogue Marcy Tilton Women's Waterfall Jacket, 8839

products.name: Vogue Women's Jacket & Skirt, 8841

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 8835
products.description: Create versatile skirts with this fantastic sewing pattern from Vogue. products.name: Vogue Women's Trousers, 8836
products.description: Set the trend creating your own fashionable culottes and flared trousers with this Sewing pattern from Vogue. Trousers A and B have stitched hems., trouser C comes with carriers, back-button flaps and cuffs and a separately purchased belt. products.name: Vogue Women's Tops, 8831

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunic And Trousers, 8821

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Cardigan, 8819

products.name: Vogue Women's Top, 8815

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 8818

products.name: Vogue Women's Gown, 8852

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunic, 8854

products.name: Vogue Women's Blouse & Tunic, 8857

B,C,E,F: seam opening on sleeves with button cuff, thread loop (B,C). D,E,F: collar band, D,F(collar).

products.name: Vogue Women's Top, 8856

products.name: Vogue Women's Coat, 8860

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirt, 8858

products.name: Vogue Women's Coat, 8862
products.description: Create a beautiful coat using this simple Vogue sewing pattern. Loose-fitting and unlined with a layered waterfall collar once create, this coat is great for any occasion.

products.name: Vogue Women's Jackets & Belt, 8861

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 8956

products.name: Vogue Women's Trousers, 8955

products.name: Vogue Very Easy Women's Cape, 8959
products.description: No Description

products.name: Vogue Women's Jacket, Top, Dress, Skirt And Trouser, 8963

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunic, Skirt And Trousers, 8962

products.name: Vogue Women's Shorts, 9008

products.name: Vogue Women's Crop Jacket, 9016

Variation C and D: drape, hem band extends into tie ends and French seams.

products.name: Vogue Women's Lightweight Jacket, 9009

products.name: Vogue Women's Skirts, 9007

products.name: Vogue Women's Tops, 9006

products.name: Vogue Easy Options Women's Tops Sewing Patterns, 9771

Each variation is mid-knee in length with front princess seams, side zipper and a straight fit. Variations A, B: back vents. Variation B: tab with button trim. Variation C: back pleats. Variation D: gored back and shaped hem. Suggested Fabrics: Wool Crepe, Gabardine, Lightweight Linen, Wool and Wool Blends, Stretch Wovens.

products.name: Vogue Women's Nightwear, 7837
products.description: Create this beautifully feminine nightwear range using this paper pattern. There is an array of sleeping styles to choose from including a camisole, top, teddy, nightgown, trousers and slippers. A: Has a shaped hemline and back ribbon bow. B: Has side slits. C: falls to the lower calf. D are semi-fitted, pull- on shorts with a high-thigh cut. E are loose-fitting, lower calf or full length trousers with an elasticized waist.F is a fitted teddy. The slippers are non-skidding. NOTIONS: Camisole A, Top B, Nightgown C, Shorts D, Pants E,F and Teddy G: Approx. 1 1/2" (38mm) Scalloped Edge Trim: 1 5/8 yd. (1.5m) for A,B: 2 7/8 yds. (2.7m)

products.name: Vogue Women's Bellville Sassoon Dress, 2890
products.description: Create a gorgeous full-length evening gown for special occasions with this Vogue Bellville Sassoon sewing pattern. The fitted, lined dress features an interfaced, boned foundation with purchased bra cups. The below-waist straight skirt has a back slit and a flared overskirt with an off-centred, gathered train. It's finished with fabric flowers with contrast centres, and left side zipper closure. The dress comes with a detachable shrug which snaps to dress front.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dress & Jacket, 2859
products.description: Create a gorgeous evening dress, directional jacket and feminine blouse with this easy Vogue sewing pattern. Dress: Fitted, A-line with shoulder straps, front slit and side snap closing. Blouse: Short sleeves, kimono in front and raglan in back, triangular cut-out, twisted collar extending from front, and tie ends that slip through bound buttonhole in back and knots in front. Jacket: Tunic length with front extending into crushed collar, and sleeves extending to pointed yokes in front and back.

products.name: Vogue Women's Bridal Original Dress, 2842
products.description: Create a beautiful floor length wedding dress with the Vogue Bridal Original sewing pattern. Perfect for your big day, the lined dress features fitted, boned self fabric or contrast bodice with front princess seams, and a raised waist. The flared skirt features a front drape with self fabric or contrast godet, back button and a loop closing. Contrast A: Single-edged Scalloped Lace. Contrast B: Beaded Fabric.

products.name: Vogue Women's Bellville Sassoon Evening Dress, 2931
products.description: Create a beautiful floor-length evening dress for special events with the Bellville Sassoon sewing pattern for Vogue. The pattern is easy to master and creates a fitted, lined dress with flattering princess seams and a bow detail. Features include a front bra, concealed back zipper closing and neck straps, built-in foundation with boning, and hook and eye tape closing.

products.name: Vogue Women's Bellville Sassoon Evening Gown, 2929
products.description: Create an elegant floor-length dress with this Bellville Sassoon sewing pattern for Vogue. The bias dress features a contrast panel and knot, asymmetrical seams, side slit, train, zipper and foundation with boning. This figure-flattering gown is perfect for glamorous events and special occasions.

products.name: Vogue Women's Bridal Original Dresses, 2965
products.description: Create a gorgeous bridal gown with this Vogue Women's Bridal Original Sewing Pattern. Cut on the bias, the floor length fitted dress features a faced bodice, raised waistline and lined skirt with back zipper. Variation B features a side back and back hemline extending to form the train, and also has a detachable contrast train with purchased trim. Suggested Fabric: Crepe Back Satin, Charmeuse and Soft Silk-like Faille. Contrast B: Chiffon and Georgette. Lining A, B: Crepe de Chine.

products.name: Vogue Vintage Women's Dress, 2962
products.description: Capture old-school glamour in these gorgeous gowns which you can create using this pattern designed for organza, chiffon, voile, lawn and taffeta fabrics. The halter dress is designed in two lengths, with a fitted lower bodice around the midriff and a gathered upper bodice.

products.name: Vogue Women's Bridal Original Dress, 2979
products.description: Create a dazzling bridal gown complete with a beautiful sash with this Vogue Women's Bridal Original Sewing Pattern. The dress features a contrast bodice, contrast sleeves, front and back darts, skirt with gathered sides, re-applied lace, front non-functioning loops and a back zipper. Variation A: short sleeves and purchased ribbon sash. Variation B: long sleeves with button loop closures, train and gathered sash.

products.name: Kwik Sew Baby Romper, Booties & Hat, 2433
products.description: This sewing pattern from Kwik Sew allows you to create an adorable set for that special newborn in your life, includes pattern for baby romper, bodysuit, hat and booties. "The Baby Rompers, Jumpsuits, Cap & Booties are designed for stretch knits only with 25% stretch across the grain. We suggest interlock, stretch terry or velour. The rompers bottom edges and necklines are finished with self fabric binding and a snap closure at the crotch. Romper A overlaps at the shoulders and has short sleeves. View B has long sleeves, a round neckline, a slit at the center back and optional eyelet trim on the neckline. The sleepsuits have long sleeves, snap closures on the front and inside legs, and the neckline is finished with a self fabric binding. View C has feet.

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Sportswear, 2723
products.description: This sewing pattern from Kwik Sew will has you covered for your sports and leisure activities! Pattern includes vest top, shorts and yoga pants. The top has a scoop neckline on the front, a racing back, and bust lining with elastic on the bottom edge. Variant A trousers are without side seams, have straight legs and an elastic waist. Variant B shorts are without side seams, have front panel seams and an elastic waist and are hemmed. Variant C shorts have elastic on the bottom edges of the legs. We suggest swimsuit fabric, fabrics with spandex-Lycra®, cotton-Lycra®, stretch velvet with Lycra®.

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Slippers, 0178
products.description: With these sewing patterns from Kwik Sew you can create these comfortable and snazzy women's slippers from one of four designs. These chic slippers will look fun and fabulous whether you're wearing them around the house or down at the pool. You can create them in four different sizes, a range of fabrics and what ever colours and patterns you can think of. There four different designs. Slipper A has a pretty contrast bow and rick-rack trim. Slipper B has a contrast strap with a ruffle. Slipper C has a contrast strap and bow. Slipper D has a contrast strap and flower with a button center. All slippers have non-slip soles using UltraSuede® or gripper fabric with purchased bias tape binding. Designed for lightweight woven fabrics such as cotton, cotton types and non-slip fabric such as UltraSuede® or gripper fabric for the soles. Sizes: S-M-L-XL

products.name: Vogue Tracy Reese Women's Dress, 1397
products.description: This flowing gown by Tracy Reese has fluid shape as well as striking structure. Create this design using this pattern with silk/linen blends, jacquard, poplin and organza for the petticoat. This dress has a fitted bodice, slightly flared skirt, side front pockets and ruffled edges.

products.name: Vogue Today's Fit Women's Top and Trousers, 1355
products.description: Create this smart top and trousers using this pattern. The lined top is close-fitting through the bust, while the trousers have a waistband for adjustment, an inside leg drape and then tapering at the lower edge. Designed for drapey knits and lingerie knits for the top.

products.name: Vogue DKNY Shirt, Skirt and Camisole, 1368
products.description: Create this exquisite design by DKNY, a loose-fitting collared shirt extending into tie ends, a shaped hemline, sleeves pleated into button cuffs with continuous lap and a fly button closing. The lined skirt has a waistband, ruffles and an invisible side zipper. Designed for fabrics such as sequined chiffon, devore velvet and silk jacquard.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Dress, 1361
products.description: Create this glamorous and sophisticated design by Donna Karen, inspired by her fashion-forward runway designs with this sewing pattern. Close-fitting and lined with a mock wrap and a deep neckline. This glamorous design is perfect for wearing to a party or special occasion. Best for us on two-way stretch knit fabrics including rayon, spandex and wool.

products.name: Vogue Guy Laroche Women's Top And Skirt, 1362
products.description: Sew your own designer dress with this stylish sewing pattern from Vogue. The very loose-fitting, pullover, pleated top has dropped shoulders, sleeveless stay, sleeves with tucks and stitched hems, and exposed back zipper stitched on right side of fabric. The lined, pleated and gathered, below waist skirt has bias, fold-back waistband, and side pockets. For a better result use Crepe, Matte Jersey, or Challis

products.name: Vogue Anne Klein Women's Top and Trousers, 1366
products.description: Follow this pattern and create this glamorous outfit from Anne Klein using Georgette, crepe de chine and batiste fabric for the blouse and wool flannel, crepe and linen for the trousers. The beautiful blouse pops in colour and has a collar with two-piece sleeves. The trousers are semi-fitted and sit below the waist with a bootleg cut.The perfect outfit to make the room stand still to attention.

products.name: Vogue Women's Coat and Belt, 1365
products.description: This wrap coat will add major high fashion points to your wardrobe. As the colder weather settles in you rest warm and comfortably in this outerwear design which can create using this pattern with low pile fake fur and medium weight woolen fabrics. The linings is made using satin. The coat has shoulder pads, a large collar, lapels, three-piece sleeves and a belt. A stunning style staple from Vogue.

products.name: Vogue Women's Top and Trousers, 1367
products.description: Create this cool casual set of trousers and top using this pattern with contrast fabric, crepe de chine, charmeuse and silk broadcloth for the top and wool crepe, ponte knit and tropical wool for the trousers. The top is loose-fitting with top bias neck binding and a shaped hemline. The trousers are also loose-fitting sitting below the waist with elastic in the waist for adjustment.

products.name: Vogue Tracy Reese Women's Dress, 1379
products.description: Create this loose-fitting dress with a neck band and front neckline slit, using such fabrics as lightweight linen, matte jersey and crepe de chine. The dress can be worn during a day trip or for dinner in the evening. The dress has tabs a camisole with shoulder straps attached and the waist is partially elastic.

products.name: Vogue Koos Women's Coat, 1377
products.description: Indulge yourself by creating this luxurious loose-fitting coat designed for double-sided fabrics. The coat is unlined with contrast and overlay variations and side front welt pockets (stitched in place). Wrap up warm and showcase your style this chic design.

products.name: Vogue Badgley Mischka Women's Dress, 1374
products.description: Create this high-class glamorous gown using this sewing pattern designed for two-way stretch knits such as sequin mesh, rayon/spandex and stretch velvet. This dress is close-fitting with a back-pleated drape extending into a fishtail hemline. Ideal for those special formal occasions.

products.name: Vogue Anne Klein Women's Smart and Casual, 1388
products.description: Whether you wish to dress smart or casual, this sewing pattern has both sides of the style spectrum covered. The jacket is lined and fitted with a collar, lapels, shoulder pads, welt pockets and two piece sleeves. The trousers are semi-fitted and tapered. Fabrics to use are men's suiting, linen and crepe.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Blazer, Top and Skirt, 1389
products.description: This cool chic smart and casual design can be created using stretch crepe, stretch denim, wool jersey, rayon/spandex or cotton/spandex. The jacket is longer at the back, fitted with shoulder pads and welt pockets. The top has neck and sleeve bands while the skirt has a raised waist and invisible back zipper.

products.name: Vogue Rebecca Taylor Women's Top/Vest, 1387
products.description: Create these trendy tops using this sewing pattern with such fabrics as charmeuse, broadcloth and crepe de chine. Top A is a mock wrap pullover, fitted through the bust with the front longer than the back. Top B is loose fitting with a collar and long sleeves with pleats.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Dress, 1384
products.description: This pattern shows you how to create this sleek number designed by Donna Karan, a fitted wrap dress with two-piece sleeves and a front snap closing. Fabrics to use are crepe de chine, charmeuse and heavy georgette. The perfect dress to wear for an evening occasion.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Jacket, 1346
products.description: Create this smooth open jacket, perfect for the upcoming season. The jacket is loose-fitting, unlined with the front and sleeves cut-in-one. Use cotton blends, ponte knit and linen for fabrics.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Top And Skirt, 1324
products.description: Make beautiful workwear outfits with this sewing pattern from Vogue. The blouse was designed for charmeuse or lightweight jersey, and the skirt for wool flannel, wool crepe or wool double knit. The loose-fitting, pullover blouse has tucked front extending into back pleated collar, upper back with pleat/inseam slit, lower band, two-piece, bias, pleated sleeves and cuffs. The semi-fitted, lined, tapered skirt has raised waist with band, side panels, no side seams, invisible back zipper, and vent.

products.name: Vogue Pamella Rolland Women's Coat, 1332
products.description: Prepare for the cold months designing your own coats with this sewing pattern from Vogue. This underlined, lined jacket comes with bias collar, self-lined yokes, front and back cut-in-one forming front and back pleats, no side seams, welt pockets, shaped hemline, and snap closing. The fabrics that will work better for this model are: jacquard, crepe back satin and lightweight gabardine.

products.name: Vogue Guy Laroche Women's Coat And Trousers, 1335
products.description: Create fashionable coats and trousers with this sewing pattern from Vogue. The very loose-fitting, lined jacket was designed for melton, fleece and boiled wool and features neck band, welt pockets, two-piece sleeves with insets, topstitching, snap closing and optional tabs with snaps. The semi-fitted, tapered pants have waistband, side front pockets and fly front zipper. It looks better when created with crepe or gabardine.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Coat, 1321
products.description: Brave the cold in style creating your own coats with Vogue's sewing pattern. This very loose-fitting, unlined, double-breasted coat features a front extending into collar, shoulder pads, dropped shoulders, topstitched darts, side front pockets (piping)/seams, stitched hems, three-piece sleeves with button tab, thread loops, raw edge finish, and overlapped seams. The recommended fabrics for this coat are lightweight melton, boiled wool and wool double Knit and china silk or crepe de chine for the lining.

products.name: Vogue Issey Miyake Women's Coat, 1320
products.description: Design and sew utterly glamorous coats with this sewing pattern from Vogue. This semi-fitted, lined coat has rolled collar, yokes, side panels, no shoulder/side seams, side front pockets and two-piece sleeves. Designed for novelty woolens, mohair or fleece.

products.name: Vogue DKNY Women's Cape, 1322
products.description: Create and sew a very stylish cape using this sewing pattern from Vogue. This very loose-fitting, lined cape has collar, shoulder pads, princess seams, welt pockets, flaps, side front openings, no side seams, and front button placket closing. For better results we recommend you to use gabardine, denim, or light weight melton.

products.name: Vogue Rachel Comey Women's Top And Trousers, 1323
products.description: Fashion a smart workwear outfit with this Vogue's Sewing Pattern. Designed for crepe de chine, charmeuse and lightweight linen. The loose-fitting, pullover top has collar, front button bands, self-lined yoke, forward shoulder seams, flaps, pleated pockets, and sleeves with pleats, button cuffs and continuous lap. Narrow hem. Collar, bands, yokes are cut on crosswise grain of fabric. Pants have a loose-fitting through the hips, elastic waist/leg bands, side front/back welt pockets, fly front zipper and hook/eye closure.

products.name: Vogue Kay Unger Women's Dress, 1303
products.description: Create a flattering shift dress using the Kay Unger sewing pattern for Vogue. Great for special occasions and dazzling parties, the fitted, lined dress has a bias, pleated middle front, pleated lower front (right side) and back vent/zipper with self tab when finished.

products.name: Vogue Rebecca Taylow Women's Top, 1306
products.description: This sewing pattern from Rebecca Taylor allows you to create a variety of tops lightweight tops that are a fun alternative to your classic basics. Pullover top or tunic has narrow hem. A: loose-fitting, sleeveless, neck binding, flounces (wrong side may show), yoke back, and purchased trim. B: fitted, back longer than shaped front hemline, neck band, and placket. Variant C: very loose-fiting, twisted front and back (cut-in-one) form shoulder straps. Cut on crosswise grain of fabric. Wrong side of fabric shows on variants B and C. Suitable for moderate stretch knits only.

products.name: Vogue Ralph Rucci Women's Top and Skirt, 1310
products.description: Design elegant black tie dresses with this fantastic sewing pattern from Vogue. Featuring a semi-fitted, pullover top and a loose-fitting through the hips skirt with the front extending into tie ends, no side seams and shaped hemline. Both are bias, self-lined, narrow hemmed and unsuitable for obvious diagonals. The suggested fabrics to work this model are lightweight silk crepe, charmeuse or matte jersey.

products.name: Vogue Lorcan Mullany Women's Top & Skirt, 1296
products.description: Create a stylish skirt and top ensemble to stand out at special occasions with the Lorcan Mullany for Bellville Sassoon Vogue sewing pattern. Top: Fitted, lined and boned with front extending into pleated collar. Features a pleated peplum, long, two-piece sleeves with darted cap, underarm gusset, and front extension with hook/eye closing. Skirt: Semi-fitted, lined with waistband, back godet extending to lower side front, and invisible back zipper. Would suit shantung, crepe or bengaline fabric. Sizing: 8-16

products.name: Kwik Sew Misses' Skirt Sewing Patterns, K2957
products.description: Create beautiful designs in a variety of styles and lengths with these Kwik Sew skirt sewing patterns. With Kwik Sew's famously simple instructions, just pick a fabric of your choice - wool, twill and linen are suggested - and get creative to design your very own skirts. Intended for sizes XS - XL, these designs offer three templates for a variety of cuts and lengths.

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Pyjamas, 2811
products.description: Create fun and flirty pyjamas with this sewing pattern from Kwik Sew. Includes two pyjama set variations that can be mixed and matched. The shirt has front button closures, a collar, a pocket with a pocket band and sleeve cuffs. The pull-on pants and shorts have elastic in a casing on the back and ties on the front. Variant A has long sleeves. Varian B has short sleeves and a collar. The sleeve cuffs and pocket band are made from a contrast fabric. Designed for lightweight woven fabrics such as cotton, cotton types, broadcloth, chambray, flannelette, silk or silk like fabrics.

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Dress and Top, 2836
products.description: This women's pattern creates sleeveless maxi dresses and two types of tops. The dress has a slightly flared skirt, bust darts, side seam pockets; the neckline and armholes are finished with bias-cut self-fabric bindings. Dress A has a front button closure. Dress B is a pullover style and the back has a casing with self-fabric ties. The pullover shirts are close fitting, with a narrow hem finish at the neckline. Top A has a round neckline and full-length sleeves. Top B has a boat neckline and short sleeves.

products.name: Kwik Sew Unisex Hoodie Sewing Patterns, 3045
products.description: Create enviably cosy loungewear with these excellent unisex shirts sewing patterns from Kwik Sew. Designed for stretch knits only to ensure perfect style and comfort, this pack includes simple instructions for two casual unisex tops. Simply pick your preferred stretch knit fabric and create a brilliantly comfortable top of your very own design. Sizes: XS-XL

products.name: Vogue Tracy Resse Women's Dress, 1285
products.description: This mock wrap dress sewing pattern from Tracy Reese creates a dress that is ideal for transitioning from office to evening. Fully lined the long sleeved dress features a blazer style collar, the close-fitting bodice features a fitted skirt with mock waistband, belt loops and invisible side zipper. Lining forms an attached slip with shoulder and lingerie straps. Belt not included. Ideal for use with two-way stretch knits.

products.name: Vogue Guy Laroche Women's Top and Skirt, 1284
products.description: Create your very own Guy Lroche design with this sewing pattern for a Sports Luxe style top and skirt set. The top is in a very loose fit with neck bands, low armholes, lower band with snap closing and sleeves with darted cap and bands. Semi-fitted skirt (below waist) has welt pockets, side front slit and invisible back zipper.

products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Lingerie, 2589
products.description: Feel pretty as you sleep by creating this beautiful, feminine set of lingerie using this pattern. Designed for soft, light fabrics including silk, batiste, satin and charmeuse to fall gently on our skin. The chemise and camisole have narrow shoulder straps and the top edges are finished with facings. The bottom edges are finished with narrow hems. The shorts have a stitched elastic waist and narrow hems at the leg openings.

products.name: Vogue Pamella Roland Women's Dress, 1265
products.description: This Vogue sewing pattern comes from the studios of American designer Pamella Roland, this workwear inspired dress is all business on the front and party at the back with its fun bustle detailing on the back. Loose-fitting and partially interfaced this pullover dress is fitted at the bust with a lapel style collar. Front hemline slit, flared, pleated lower back, invisible side zipper and cap sleeves with bias armhole binding.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Top and Skirt, 1259
products.description: Create your luxurious matching skirt and top skirt from the design house of Donna Karen. Mix and match the set with your favourite wardrobe items or wear together for an on-trend co-ordinated look. The top features a stylish mock turtle neck neckline with ruching detailing on the front, cap sleeves and key hole opening on the back. Skirt is a pull on skirt with ruching throughout. Top and skirt close fitting with no provision provided for above waist adjustments. Raw edges of fabric will show on front and back seams of both garments. Best with two way knits.

products.name: Vogue Donna Karan Women's Top and Skirt, 1282
products.description: This top and skirt set sewing pattern from Donna Karen is the ideal combination of elegance and fun. Top has a loose fit , cut on the bias with a weighted draped front neckline and no side seams. While the skirt is very tight fitting with contrast facing, pleats, front extending to side back, no side seams and right side back slit. Self bias binding finishes hem.

products.name: Vogue Ralph Rucci Women's Dress and Jacket, 1269
products.description: This sewing pattern from Ralph Rucci allows you to create a beautiiful formal dress and jacket set. Includes pattern for dress, jacket and belt. Jacket is fully lined and does not meet at the center front. Dress is in a flattering knee length with double-lining. Close fitting through bust with side front and back seam, no side seams and invisible back zipper. Both have double-layered flounces and baby narrow hems. Self, bias belt is knotted.

products.name: Vogue Rebecca Taylor Women's Tunic, 1255
products.description: Rebecca Taylor's sewing pattern for Vogue is a loose fitting tunic which can be easily created at home. Features raw edges of ruffle fabric and elastic casings when created. Great for wearing over leggings or trousers, it would suit crepe, charmeuse or jersey fabric.

products.name: Vogue Issey Miyake Women's Top and Trousers, 1204
products.description: Stylish and chic, this pattern from Issey Miyake is ideal for the fashion forward. The loose fitting tunic features tuck detailing with a large collar, full length sleeves with plackets and cuffs. Trousers are fitted, below waistline pants has front side slant pockets, back patch pockets, fly zipper closing, back yoke, waistband, carriers and topstitch trim.

products.name: Vogue Anne Klein Women's Dress, 1192
products.description: Create your own classic evening dress with this Anne Klein sewing pattern from Vogue. Fitted, straight, above mid-knee length, lined dress has side front tucks, back zipper and hemline vent.

products.name: Vogue Badgley Mishcka Women's Dress, 1288
products.description: Create a beautiful dress with the Badgley Mishcka sewing pattern for Vogue. Great for parties and glittering events, the fitted, lined dress features an overlay, contrast bias trim and invisible back zipper once made. Opt for chiffon, voile or charmeuse fabric, and Georgette or batiste for the lining.

products.name: Vogue Badgley Mishcka Women's Top and Dress, 1195
products.description: Create this stunning dress, top and belt outfit designed by Badgley Mischka, great as an eye-catching set or on their own. Pullover, fitted top has front and back stitched pleats, front and back V-neckline with self-binding, bound buttonhole openings for belt, stitched sides forming sleeve openings and shaped hem. Close-fitting, straight, above mid-knee length dress has front and back darts, front and back V-neckline with self-binding, self-armhole binding forming straps, back invisible zipper and belt.

products.name: New Look Women's Jackets & Gilets Sewing Patterns, 6308
products.description: Create stylish and comfy jackets and gilets with this sewing pattern from Simplicty. These functional jackets can be made with a zipper front and side slit pockets. Jacket and gilet with patch pockets are also suitable requited fabrics and contrast sleeves on jacket.

products.name: New Look Women's Outfits Sewing Patterns, 6315
products.description: Create a whole wardrobe of stylish women's clothes with this sewing pattern from Simplicity. Includes pattern for knit fabric trousers, skirt, top and jacket in a comfortable and stylish for everyday wear. Pattern includes scoop neck top with half sleeves, cascade jacket, slim pull on pants and slim pull on maxi skirt with slit.

products.name: New Look Women's Tops Sewing Patterns, 6306
products.description: This pattern from Simplicity creates stylish, easy to sew tops for her. The pattern includes tops with a loose ruffle hem and keyhole back opening with short or long sleeve options. For a fashion forward look, top can be made in lace with and a double ruffle hem.

products.name: Vogue Women's Tunics, 8581
products.description: Stay on trend by creating tunics with neck binding, lower elastic casing and raglan sleeve variations. Designed for two-way stretch knits such as cotton Lycra, rayon Lycra and nylon Lycra.

products.name: Vogue Women's Trousers, 8584
products.description: Create this set of cool casual trousers using this pattern designed for lightweight double knit, cotton knit, lightweight broadcloth and twill fabric. Trousers A and B have an elastic waist and cord ties, with the hem above the ankle and side pockets. Trousers C has side pockets, an elastic waist and a belt with "D" ring closures.

products.name: Vogue Claire Shaeffer Women's Jackets, 8621
products.description: Create this high class jacket design using this pattern. The jacket is fitted with shaped front opening edges, bound buttonholes, back pleats, gussets and kimono-shaped sleeves. The jacket is constructed using couture sewing methods. designed for wool flannel, lightweight tweed and boucle fabric.

products.name: Vogue Women's Jackets, 8622
products.description: Create these sophisticated loose-fitting jackets to be worn over your evening gown or smart trousers and top. These jackets have no closures and sit above the waistline. Variant A has dolman sleeves and a back collar extending into shoulders. Variant B sits high above the waistline. Variant C is sheer with draping. Variant A and B should consist of satin, taffeta and faille. Variant C should consist of chiffon and crepe.

products.name: New Look Women's Skirts Sewing Patterns, 6311
products.description: Create a gorgeous flared skirts in three flattering lengths with this sewing pattern from Simplicty. With only 4 pattern pieces, this skirt is so easy to make yet has so many options. It can be made mid calf, knee length or mini and with or without an extra layer.

products.name: New Look Women's Skirts Sewing Patterns, 6312
products.description: This sewing pattern from Simplicity creates stylish pencil skirts in two lengths. Knee length skirt features overlay on front and back panel or contrast panels and waistband. Mini skirt has option of piped front and back panels.

products.name: New Look Women's Dresses & Jackets Sewing Patterns, 6302
products.description: Create classic shift dresses that can be worn at work or for special occasions, and a matching bomber jacket style pattern. The A-line dress has bust darts for shape and can be worn with a jacket featuring contrast bands or cropped jacket, both with princess seams.

products.name: New Look Children's Dresses & Trousers Sewing Patterns, 6317
products.description: Create adorable outfits for your little ones with this sewing pattern from Simplicity which includes girls' toddler dress, top and trousers. Enjoy fabric mixing and applying trims to create fun ruffle filled designs for toddlers. Dress and pants feature contrast fabrics. Top features trim and bow or flower details.

products.name: New Look Women's Skirts Sewing Patterns, 6316
products.description: Create stylish flared mini skirts with this sewing pattern from Simplicity. Pattern includes two lengths; knee length and mini skirt.

products.name: New Look Women's Tops & Skirts Sewing Patterns, 6314
products.description: Create a stylish skirt and top with this sewing pattern from Simplicty, wear them together for an on-trend chic-casual outfit or wear them on their own. The top is in a relaxed sportswear style with long sleevs, contrast bands or three quarter sleeve knit top with tie waist. Skirt can be made in two lengths; knee length and modern midi with mesh overlay and slip ruffle.

products.name: New Look Women's Tops Sewing Patterns, 6303
products.description: Create a range of gorgeous blouses with sewing pattern from Simplicty, with four different designs these blouses can be worn at work, on girls night out or for casual formal occasions. Make these soft blouse staples in your closet, with flutter, long sleeves or sleeveless with crossover blouson front and optional longer shirttail at back for an overall flattering look.

products.name: Vogue Women's Dresses, 8577
products.description: Create these exquisite dress designs for casual or formal wear using this pattern. The dresses are close-fitting with side pockets and a flared skirt that falls below the knee. Designed for batiste, gingham, and lightweight linen.

products.name: Burda Women's Dress and Top, 6848

products.name: Burda Women's Top and Dress, 6850

View A has lapped fronts, full length sleeves, and incorporates three contrast fabrics. View B has elbow length sleeves and smart turtleneck. products.name: Kwik Sew Women's Misses' Gilet, 3845

Quick and easy to create, these key wardrobe pieces are perfect for layering. These fitted gilets have angled front panel seams, armholes finished with facings, and front button or snap closures. View A features a large single layer collar, the front edges and collar are finished with wide bias cut binding. products.name: Simplicity Plus Size Dressmaking Leaflet, 1810, A
products.description: Simplicity sewing pattern for women's standard and plus size pullover dress in two lengths, tunic or top with shoulder pleat detailing, sleeve variation and tie belt at the waist and pull-on pants. Sizes: 4-26.

products.name: Simplicity Aprons, 9565
products.description: Sewing patterns for smart cooking aprons. Fits men, women and teens. One size.

products.name: Simplicity Easy to Sew Plus Size Scrubs Sewing Leaflet, 3542

products.description: Make plus size unisex pyjamas and a knit tank top with this Easy to Sew pattern from Simplicity. Sizes: S (chest/bust 40-42", waist 34-36", hip 41-43") M (chest/bust 44-46", waist 39-42", hip 45-47") L (chest/bust 48-50", waist 44-46", hip 49-51") XL (52-54" chest/bust, 44-46" waist, 49-51" hip) XXL (56-58" chest/bust, 52-54" waist, 57-57" hip) XXXL (60-62" chest/bust, 56-58" waist, 61-63" hip)

products.name: Simplicity Easy to Sew Scrubs Sewing Leaflet, 4378
products.description: Simplicity Easy-to-Sew pattern for making women's, men's and teens' scrub tops and trousers. Sizes: XS (chest/bust 30-32", hip 31-32.5") S (chest/bust 34-36", hip 35-37") M (chest/bust 38-40", hip 39-41") L (chest/bust 42-44", hip 43-45") XL (chest/bust 46-48", hip 47-49")
